description: Apollo.io is a sales intelligence and engagement platform that provides tools for prospecting, lead generation, and sales automation to help businesses improve their sales processes and outreach efforts.
name: apollo
title: Apollo

actions.description: Updates the details of existing deals within your team's Apollo account.
actions.name: updateDeal

properties.description: The ID for the deal you want to update.
properties.name: opportunity_id
properties.label: Opportunity Id

properties.description: The ID for the deal owner within your team's Apollo account.
properties.name: owner_id
properties.label: Owner ID

properties.description: Updated estimated close date for the deal. This can be a future or past date.
properties.name: closed_date
properties.label: Close Date

properties.description: The ID for the account within your Apollo instance. This is the company that you are targeting as part of the deal being created.
properties.name: account_id
properties.label: Account ID

actions.title: Update Deal

actions.description: Creates new deal for an Apollo account.
actions.name: createDeal

properties.description: Name the deal you are creating.
properties.name: name
properties.label: Name

properties.description: The ID for the deal owner within your team's Apollo account.
properties.name: owner_id
properties.label: Owner ID

properties.description: The ID for the account within your Apollo instance. This is the company that you are targeting as part of the deal being created.
properties.name: account_id
properties.label: Account ID

properties.description: The monetary value of the deal being created. Do not enter commas or currency symbols for the value.
properties.name: amount
properties.label: Amount

properties.description: The estimated close date for the deal. This can be a future or past date.
properties.name: closed_date
properties.label: Close Date

actions.title: Create Deal

properties.description: The first name of the person.
properties.name: first_name
properties.label: First Name

properties.description: The lst name of the person.
properties.name: last_name
properties.label: Last Name

properties.description: The full name of the person.
properties.name: name
properties.label: Name

properties.description: The email address of the person.
properties.name: email
properties.label: Email

properties.description: The name of the person's employer.
properties.name: organization_name
properties.label: Organization Name

properties.description: The domain name for the person's employer. This can be the current employer or a previous employer. Do not include www., the @ symbol, or similar.
properties.name: domain
properties.label: Domain

properties.description: The URL for the person's LinkedIn profile.
properties.name: linkedin_url
properties.label: LinkedIn URL

properties.description: The domain of the company that you want to enrich. Do not include www., the @ symbol, or similar.
properties.name: domain
properties.label: Domain
